name: Direct Marketing: Outbound Telemarketing Merchants
description:
Merchants that initiate direct contact with consumers to sell
products and services. Outbound telemarketing merchants contact
(and sometimes offer an incentive to) prospective buyers by phone,
advertising, direct mail (other than a catalog), or other direct
marketing method that includes either a toll-free phone number or a
mailing address. Products promoted and sold via such methods may
include cosmetics, health-care products, vitamins, and time-share
realty.
For charitable organizations that solicit contributions by any means,
including via outbound telemarketing, use MCC 8398.
